name: LockedAccount
description: LockedAccount. This contract will lock any funds transfered into it and destroy the contract at withdrawal like a piggybank.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Deposit is emited when ETHER is transfered into this smart-contract.

eventDecorators.name: Withdraw
eventDecorators.description: Withdraw is emited when ETHER is transfered out from this smart-contract.

functionDecorators.name: addToWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Whitelist an address. Call restricted to only whitelisted addresses.

functionDecorators.name: getList
functionDecorators.description: Return the whitelist. Call restricted to only whitelisted addresses.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw all the funds, then destroys the contract. Restricted to only whitelisted accounts.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawERC20
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw a given ERC20 token. Restricted to only whitelisted accounts.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The contract address of the ERC20 to withdraw.
